item.title: Book review: Single Page Web Applications
item.description:
I decided to read this book because I wanted to learn about the architecture and implementation of a Single Page Application (SPA). And it turned out to be a good choice.

What I particularly liked about the book is that it begins from scratch and shows how to implement a SPA without relying on heavy frameworks. Whenever a library is used, it is done with a purpose (clearly explained by the authors).
